text: "Sleepwalker" is a song by Adam Lambert released off his debut album For Your Entertainment. The song was written by frontman of OneRepublic, Ryan Tedder, as well as Aimee Mayo, and Chris Lindsey. It was produced by Tedder and was released in Canada and New Zealand for radio mainstream on June 15, 2010. Category:Adam Lambert songs Category:2010 songs
title: Sleepwalker (song)
